attributes.action: Mandate the wearing of MASKS in publicly accessed indoor spaces post July19th.
attributes.additional_details: People have no choice but to visit those essential indoor spaces listed above. People will have a choice whether to attend the venues you are opening up with no restrictions such as pubs, cinemas etc. It is unfair to those who will not be protected as too few will wear masks, unless they are mandated, forcing vulnerable people back into isolating instead of carrying out essential tasks safely. Their only choice will be LIFE or DEATH!
attributes.background: Do not leave the wearing of masks to the public's good sense when shopping, traveling on public transport, visiting health settings & other publicly accessed indoor spaces. There are many still at risk from the virus such as those who're immune suppressed, unvaccinated or vulnerable in other ways.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Keep face covering mandatory in indoor public settings beyond 19th July 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590616

Keep mandatory face coverings in supermarkets and on public transport: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590836
 
Keep face masks mandatory for public transport after the lifting of restrictions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590694

Keep requirement to wear a face covering in shops & supermarkets after July 19th: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590829
